dialogues.text: No, I'm saying you're an idiot.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Mick pounds on the door aggressively.      Then just give

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what? You're right.    I am an idiot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he walks off to his car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John leans back against the wall, in the middle of the ba room, and listens to his brother's car start and drive aw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John stands, staring at his wall, now a vast collage, lay upon layer of photographs and notes. And no answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Dad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John sits on a bench, frustrated and lost.      Luke trot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I have my cookies?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You hungry?    You want your sandwich?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John hands him two packaged cookies. Luke runs off and ha them to Carrie. Her attractive young mother, Nicole, sitt a couple of benches down, calls and draws John's attentio

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carrie! (to John) I'm sorry. She just already has it all figured out. (John nods awkwardly) Nicole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I remember.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (knows he doesn't) Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles and admits) I remember your daughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's hard to forget. (digs in her bag) Oh, this is for you. Luke was supposed to bring it home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands him an envelope. He opens it and sees a birthday invitation with jungle animals on the cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has his father's memory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's for Carrie's birthday party. Please come; I'd love to meet your wife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid she can't be there. ...It's complicated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand. With me, too. Carrie, come on, time for lunch. (to John) We're going to the cafe on the corner, would you like to join us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, we're pretty...you know....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Busy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John smiles, busted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, we owe you for the cookies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's true.     And I made those cookies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And learned how to pre-package them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which requires a considerable amount of machinery. Come on, Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk toward the street, the kids trailing behind. Neither John nor Nicole speak for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you trade off time with Luke?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Luke and I are together full time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow. I guess that's why I see you so much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She'd like nothing better than to be here. With him. Lara. She really misses...all this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess it's all about priorities, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  She's not like that.   She'd... (has to admit) She's in prison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't tell most people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's innocent. She didn't kill the woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Good.   I mean, I'm sure she didn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicole doesn't know what else to say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should really be getting home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (feigns disappointment) Oh, okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (waving the envelope) Thanks for the invitation.    We'll try and make it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That would be great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John heads back and scoops up Luke.       Nicole watches, not to look dumbfounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John and Luke enter, John sorting through the mail. from Lara.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John finishes writing a letter on lined paper. He opens h drawer; it is full of letters in yellow envelopes. He pul one out; it is from Lara, on lined paper. He stuffs his n letter in the old yellow envelope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the only room that is still furnished. John pokes his head in, sees Luke on his bed playing by himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to read a letter from Mom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke shrugs as if he doesn't care, but then scoots over i his bed so that his dad can sit beside him. John does. He pulls the letter out of the envelope and reads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dearest Luke Who I Love, But Not As Much As Chocolate...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She didn't write that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My mistake. Dearest Luke, who I love so, so much. I wish I could have walked you home today, it was so beautiful out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke and John water Paula's vegetable garden.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what's wrong with her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's not feeling well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't she just stay home?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because sometimes people get so sick you have to go to the hospital to get fixed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know when you're that sick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doctors do tests.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something tweaks. John turns and looks back across the al at his open garage...and remembers their conversation. He drops the hose and takes Luke's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They drop the hose in the garden and walk back to the hou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John flings open the medicine cabinet, finds an old bottl of Lara's insulin. He checks the label.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John hits a key and a medical article appears: LIFE THREATENING COMPLICATIONS OF DIABETES. ...Severe Hyperkalemia...extremely high levels of potassi ...cardiac arrest...particularly dangerous as there are n outward symptoms...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera swirls as John searches the wall and photos of delivery vans arriving at the jail. Not seeing what he wa he charges the desk & rifles through more photos.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He finally snatches the photo he's looking for. He turns over -- on it is written TUESDAY 9:30 AM. And right over the phrase FIND THE KEY he pins the photo of a delivery v from a medical laboratory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Parked at a distance, John watches from inside his Prius. Finally, a DRIVER steps out of the jail carrying a tray o test results. He opens the back door of the van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John follows the van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John watches as the driver steps out with a tray, point a push his key fob, lock the doors and enter the nursing ho IN THE PRIUS - MOMENTS LATER - John watches his stopwatch The driver returns with a tray. John hits the stop button 1 MINUTE 48 SECONDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John Googles: "How to break into a car."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John heats a screwdriver on the open flame of the gas fir then places the red hot tip of it on an old tennis ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John waits, eating a donut. He sees the driver step out o Pittsburgh Med Health Lab and walk to his panel van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John follows the van again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wearing his iPod, the driver steps out with a tray and pr his key fob; the van chirps and locks. He enters the buil as John steps up to the driver's door. John checks no one is watching, places the tennis ball ov the key slot and punches the ball flat. The lock pops ope

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shelves line the walls; on them sit plastic trays of enve John climbs in and finds the tray from ALLEGHENY COUNTY J

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The driver comes back out, heading for the van. He pauses to flirt with a nurse on her break, but she isn't buying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John finds the envelope marked "Lara Brennan." He checks his watch, only 44 seconds have lapsed. He slips the card out, photographs it with his cell phone and puts it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The driver heads for the van as John opens the back door climbs out. Oblivious to his narrow escape, John closes t door and walks away a heartbeat before the driver gets th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John checks his son, who sits on the bare living room flo playing a video game on the TV, the remaining item.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay? Luke nods and shoots somebody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John brings up Lara's form in Photoshop on his laptop and erases the hand-written numbers in the test results boxes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John writes numbers in the blank boxes of the medical for Then he sits back and worries that he's got it right. Cal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke!   Time for bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John enters the child's bedroom and stops dead. The wall over Luke's bed is covered with crayon scribbles imitating the chart on his father's bedroom walls.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Luke walks into the room, and steps up beside his father, staring at the wall. He takes his father's hand, and the two just stand there in silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John waits as the other prisoners enter. Lara kisses him; looks in his eyes. He sees the despair behind the smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes a letter from her pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hands it to him.       John reads.   His face changes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No....NO! They can't move you. Not without notice! Monday isn't notice!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was only here through the appeal. We knew I'd be moved to a prison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Muncy is the other side of the state.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara nods. Off John's face, the screen goes BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John stands with Eugenie, the frightened realtor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have two weeks!     I need it tomorrow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The title hasn't been cleared -- there is no way that --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much can they give me?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John turns on his heel and slams out through the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John stares at the wall -- MONEY is down to $1,497. He rifles through a drawer, finds a pair of sunglasses. He snatches a baseball cap from a top shelf. He tosses a bag on the bed, unzips it and pulls out the g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John unscrews the license plate from a dusty black Prius. He sticks the plate under his jacket, stands and checks o his shoulder as he walks out of the massive parking lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A quiet neighborhood bank sits in the corner of an outdoo mall. The Prius pulls into a spot; we dolly over to see t stolen license plate. Inside the Prius, John opens the backpack, puts on the ha and sunglasses and places the gun on his lap. And again h looks at the bank, tapping his toe manically. A guard ope the bank door for a departing customer, smiles and heads back inside. John tightens his grip on the gun, tries to work up his courage, but ultimately realizes he can't do this. Furious with himself, he jams the car into reverse and ba up without looking. He hears a scream, brakes hard and lo A WOMAN screams. John stomps on the brakes. He leaps out of the car and sees a woman dropping her groceries and scooping her child up in her arms. Call her ELAINE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?!   You almost killed us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you --?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you out of your mind?!   You don't look?! She stoops to grab the few items that fell.    He tries t help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am so sorry --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get away!     Get away from us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stands and runs for her car. John returns to the car and sits, leaving the door open and the door alarm scream He sits there, letting the failure and his disgust for hi weakness wash over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John sits in the children's area, waiting for the line of visitors to get shorter. One look at his face and we can see how tortured he is. He has his cell phone to his ear:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it was a long shot.       Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into phone) How's Lara?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's okay.     Thanks, Meyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John hangs up and stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John stands in the corner, staring out through the high, thick windows. He turns as he hears Lara and other prison coming. He tries to smile, but she knows something is wro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it Luke?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. He's fine. I had Meyer see what he could do about not getting you moved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told him traveling that distance would be a hardship on us, that Luke was already having trouble at school. Which is true. I haven't been spending enough time with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You haven't? YOU haven't? God, John, you are too much. Luke is having a 'hard time' because mommy is in jail for murder, not because daddy doesn't spend enough time with him! Your father was right, you don't live in the same world we do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stung) That's nice, that the two of you talk. What world do I live in, Lara?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, but it's not the real one. I am in here for the rest of my life! And you want me to believe in some fantasy that -- !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A guard steps up and raps her knuckles on the table to ge their attention. Only John looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We good here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.   Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara lowers her voice a little, but not her intensity. guard walks away under:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you come here all long-faced, like you've let me down. What do you want me to do, make you feel better?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got it.   I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now you're apologizing.   You really are a gem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want from me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing. You're too perfect already. You know you never even asked me if I did it. If I killed her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stopped dead) Because I knew you didn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you'd be wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She leans forward and whispers in his ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I grabbed the fire extinguisher. I hit her in the face. I heard her neck snap. You know why I did it? Because she pissed me off. I threw her purse in the river. We paid for dinner with the cash from her wallet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sits back a bit to look in his face. Only now, lookin in his eyes, a crack forms in her tough exterior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.   I'm actually very sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stands. The guard opens the door and lets her into th changing room. John watches, unable to breathe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara gets one last look at John, through the glass, and t disappears behind the partition. She sits on the bench, leans her head between her knees, and breaks into shards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John exits along with all the other visitors, destroyed b what he has heard, playing out what she said in his head. Then suddenly he just stops. The crowd keeps moving, leav him behind. The guard following the group sees him standi there. Commands him:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, you cannot stand there. (beat) SIR, you need to exit the building NOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara takes a seat on her side of the glass partition. picks up her phone and opens her mouth to speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up. I don't care what you say or how you say it. I don't believe you did it and I never will. I know who you are. She opens her mouth to object but John slams the phone in the cradle. She pounds on the window. He just stares at her. Her eyes well up, and she smiles through her tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John steps out and sees the MAJOR waiting with his keys. They exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. The Major nods and locks the door.    John heads out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke in his arms, John takes a My Little Pony off the she

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (already an expert)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Girls love them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grace opens the door. George stands a few steps behind he quiet. Grace sees John and is immediately concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi Mom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got class.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five o'clock at night?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. (kisses Luke) Bye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke runs in as John walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John's father watches through the window as his son leave In his gut, George knows something is wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John sits in his car down the street, watching the corner where he noticed kids selling drugs. A car shows up - the same flashy car he saw weeks ago. Th street dealer looks around, runs to the window, makes an exchange, and then the car drives off again. John checks his watch and settles in to wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John watches as other cars drive up and score drugs. And then finally the flashy car cruises up again. John checks his watch: it has been two hours. Again the street dealer runs up and hands the driver an envelope. We recognize th driver -- he is the one from earlier, whom we are going t call DAVID. He drives away. John follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John follows the flashy car at a distance.    It stops at another corner and something is exchanged.    It drives o John follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not the best part of town. It looks rough even for The Hi The flashy car parks and David crosses the street. Half a block back, John turns left at the corner and then makes a quick right into the alley. He guesses how many houses from the corner David stopped, gets out and checks over the fences. He stops a few houses away when he sees the porch light o house flick on. David waits on the dilapidated back porch He waves to whoever is watching him through the pinhole a the light goes out again.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: John inches closer as the back door opens. David exchange a few words with whoever opened it and then packages are exchanged. The door closes and David walks off the way he came. John waits a moment, then moves down the alley, hops the fence, and sneaks through the twisted bramble of the back yard. He finds a place to hide, on the ground right besid the back porch. He pulls out his gun and settles in to wa between the trash cans, his heart pounding in his ears. Fade to BLACK.      Beat, then:   BANG!   BANG!    BANG!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John WAKES to HAMMERING on the door. The porch light flic on and John is bathed in bright light -- he didn't realiz he'd fallen asleep. David stands above him on the porch, holding the screen door open -- if he glanced down there no way he wouldn't see him. John holds his     breath and waits. The porch light flic off, the locks     are unbolted, and finally the thick do As before, the     two exchange words, but now the POUNDI John's ears is     so loud we can barely hear anything el John takes a deep breath and springs to his feet -- knock over the trash cans -- and onto the porch! He smacks David with the gun, grabs him by the hair and j him forward into the doorway, preventing the supplier -- ALEX -- from slamming the door on them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alex releases his BARKING German shepherd and it immediat attacks David, biting his leg. David screams in agony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Alex) Back up! Get back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a THUG comes barreling in from the kitchen and a a sawed-off shotgun at John, who keeps himself right behi David's head. The dialogue is almost drowned out complete by the sound of POUNDING in John's ears and David's SCREA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Shoot them both!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- I'll shoot the dog!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Shoot the dog!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- You shoot the dog, I'll kill you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John fires into the floor beside the dog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- You want the police here, asshole?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Good idea!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John fires two more shots into the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to thug) -- Put the gun down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thug obeys, rests it against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Call the dog off!!   Put it away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Release!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dog stops its attack but goes back to barking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Put it away!! (aims gun at it) PUT IT AWAY!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alex reluctantly opens a closet door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In!   Get in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has to shove the barking dog into the closet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to thug) You, too!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not getting in there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John fires into the wall!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: And the thug goes in the closet after the barking dog. sees the bolt and drives it home, locking the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Give me that chair!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alex doesn't obey, so David grabs it and hands it to him. John props it under the handle of the closet door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shoves David forward, closer to Alex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't do anything!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You brought him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't bring him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes them both back into the next room; the dog in t closet never stops barking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John shoves David to the floor and waves the gun between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On your knees! Hands behind your head!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John catches Alex's eyes darting to the counter. Followin his gaze he finds Alex's revolver on the counter. John gr it, flips open the cylinder and spills out the cartridges

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't kneel!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the floor!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David kneels with great difficulty.         Alex calmly d he's told, his eyes on John.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: John grabs the paper bag out of Alex's hand and opens it, finds a couple thousand in cash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the rest?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's twelve hundred dollars! (emptying his pockets) Here, take it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A couple of hundred dollars spill onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gun on Alex) Where do you keep your money?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alex scoffs, seeing weakness in John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm going to give you my money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll shoot you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You won't even shoot a dog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoot the floor again, impress me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John pistol-whips him and Alex goes down. John holds his gun to his head while he is on the ground bleeding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to kill you both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm going to kill you both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give him your money!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to David) Keep your dead bitch mouth shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enraged, John fires a round into Alex's leg.      Alex sc

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles thru pain) See? You aren't going to kill me. That was the worst you can do. So, now you've done it. Go home. I'll come find you and kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John looks around desperately. He spots an open bottle of tequila in the clutter on the counter. He grabs it and po it on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're wasting some good shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now he pours it on Alex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, good shit; high alcohol content.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John smashes the bottle on the floor; tequila goes everyw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?! Let me out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You going to burn me out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John lights a rag as the thug in the closet continues to yell and pound. Now calmly:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.    That's what I'm going to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Jesus.    Oh Jesus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (no longer smiling) This is a meth lab, you idiot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.    It was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he tosses the burning rag at the smashed bottle. screams as the room explodes in flames.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (suddenly desperate) My kid is upstairs!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- What??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MY KID!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without warning, Alex dashes for the front hall. Stunned, John doesn't shoot. He grabs David by the hair, sticks th gun in his temple and shoves him into the front hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me go!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get up there!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John pushes him up the stairs as a shield, following the trail of blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The house is going to explode!

dialogues.speaker: BACK DOOR
dialogues.text: Fire spreads, the thug yells, the dog barks. The shotgun leans against the wall where the thug left it. The closet door rocks as the thug kicks. The chair won't give way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John moves David quickly up the stairs in front of him an down the hall. They peer into one room, nothing. Into the next - what is clearly a CHILD'S ROOM. Alex kneels on the far side of the room, barely visible b the small bed, his back to us. Until he wheels, gun in hand, and FIRES twice. A bullet strikes David in the chest, the second grazes Jo side. Both men are knocked back into the hall and onto th floor. John pulls himself out from under David as... Running on adrenaline, Alex stands and strides forward. David looks up at him. Alex shoots him again and steps ov him into the hall. He sees John, raises his weapon and... John fires twice, hits Alex in the chest, knocking him do

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: John stands. Alex lies dead, sprawled over David.   David looks around through the roiling smoke:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is anyone up here?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He steps over Alex and into the room. He checks the close empty of clothes; clearly no child lives here. John turns to where Alex was kneeling, sees a bureau pushed aside, a safe crudely installed in the wall lying open, a trash ba on the floor half-filled with cash. John drops to his knees and shovels the remaining cash in the trash bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dog barks; the door SPLINTERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John steps over the bodies; sees David looking up at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't leave me. I don't want to burn. Don't let me burn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hall is now thick with smoke. John stares terrified a the two men, one dead, one dying, and agonizes over what knows is a mistake. Cut to BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John carries David past the closet just as the thug's boo kicks a hole in the door. Cut to BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John, bleeding himself, shoves the badly wounded dealer i the back seat. He throws the trash bag into the passenger seat and slams the door closed behind him. Not even a heartbeat later THE GERMAN SHEPHERD leaps up and snaps at the partially open window. John struggles to get the car turned on and the window up as THE DOG tries to force his way into the car. Through the front windshield he sees THE THUG leap over t back fence, landing sprawled in the alley with the shotgu John jams the car into reverse and backs away -- the man the back seat screaming for his life, the dog chasing the car, the thug getting off a shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John swerves wide around the corner, hitting a fire hydra and shattering a taillight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John slams the transmission into Drive and speeds off dow the street. The dog barking disappears. All that's left are the sound of the dying man. John keeps throwing looks over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to die.   I don't want to die. Now at a safe distance, John pulls over and looks into th back seat. We don't have to see the body to know he's dea John sits there a moment, listening to the sounds of approaching fire engines. He catches a glimpse of himself in the rearview mirror before pulling out. Cut to BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John's car idles at the curb, his back door sits open. He steps back into shot from the far side of the Prius, clos the door and gets in. As he drives away we see David's bo lying on the bench, waiting to be discovered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Standing at the sink shirtless, John pours alcohol on the wound in his side. He mops up the blood with a wad of paper towels, then app a bandage, fresh from the box. He pulls a new shirt and jacket from a Target bag. A moment later, now dressed, John stuffs the trash bag fu of cash into his backpack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John steps out of the bathroom, zipping his new jacket. H barely draws a look from the few customers as he limps ou of the restaurant. Cut to BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Water streams from the house, the front door and windows broken by firemen who now pack up their gear to leave. LIEUTENANT NABULSI strides into shot, drinking a Red Bull which he crushes and discards on the porch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi climbs the stairs to find SGT. HARRIS watching th CSI team work. Nabulsi steps up behind the CSI worker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (almost a whisper)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of my way. The man flees like he just saw the prince of darkness. Nabulsi cocks his head and looks down at the dead man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A miracle. Meth lab in the basement, the house still standing. Should be just a crater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (straddles Alex)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we know him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alex Gaidar, history of violence and drug trafficking. Nabulsi sees the brightly painted walls of the child's ro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He have a kid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neighbor said wife left with him last year. Big surprise there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They type all this blood yet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, but someone left through the back door bleeding. Zone Three found a gunshot victim dead on a transit bench. Nabulsi nods and descends the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John snips the links of a tall chainlink fence, then turn and walks back to the Prius.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John eases open his parents' front door and removes his k from the lock. It's the middle of the night, so he is surprised to see a light on in the kitchen. He enters, carrying his jacket and backpack, and places them on a ch When he gets to the kitchen he sees his father in his paj reading a biography and sipping a cup of tea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.    What are you doing up? George shrugs.     An uncomfortable silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've come to get Luke. George nods. After another silence, John starts down the hall. His father appears in the hallway behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John?    Are you alright? John turns around, surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm fine. The two men look at each other for a moment, John leaves room. His father steps into the living room and notices his jac falling off the chair. George lifts it to set it right an sees something is sticking out of the backpack: airplane tickets and passports.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John steps into the room that he had as a teenager. Luke sleeps in the single bed. John sits beside him, touches h face, then looks around the room, wondering how he got he and is overwhelmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: George slips the tickets and passports out of the side po We do not see the destination, but he does. He opens the passport and reads each of the false names.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John brushes away tears, no idea how he could be acting l this. He tries to wake Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.   Hey, buddy. Not a chance. John checks the old alarm clock: it's just after three AM. He lies down beside Luke for just a momen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John WAKES to the sound of a whistle. He checks the clock It's almost five. How could that have happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John helps a sleepy Luke with his jacket, pancake rolled his hand. John stands from the table strewn with food.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give Grandma a big kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm too tired to kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll get lots of kisses next weekend. (to John)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We want to take him to the Harvest Festival in Kutztown, where they have the Clydesdales. John thinks about saying something, can't.   He watches L give Grace a kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Grandma. John turns to his father, who stands in the doorway. His father holds out the jacket in silence. John takes it The airline tickets stick out from the inside pocket.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: John realizes the tickets have been moved from the bag. H looks at his father, who gazes back at him in silence. Jo can tell by the look in his father's eye that he knows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bye Mom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They kiss.    John's father stands behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: George grabs his son in an awkward hug.      John is shoc He pats his father's back. They break.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Luke) Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John leaves.      The front door closes.   Grace walks aw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John stands in the brightly lit, glass-walled kiosk of a rental car company, the Prius parked at the curb, as the threatens to break over the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi kneels beside a fire hydrant, using a shard from taillight to scrape at a smudge of flaking black paint. Harris comes running up, out of breath, from the alley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neighbors saw a guy and a dog chase a black car down the alley, so that's probably his. We'll have the taillight debris at the lab by the time it opens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi stands and hands him the large shard of glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John packs a backpack -- two white lab coats, wire cutter a large screwdriver, two rolls of duct tape, the handgun, insulin vials, etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke sits on his bedroom floor, trying to cram a firetruc into his already full rollerboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calls)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I carry it? John appears with a box of trash bags.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.    Just what fits in your bag. John hurries off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ....What about my pockets?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or your pockets. Luke gives up on the truck and moves to his bedside table He digs his hand into the small jar of coins his dad gave him and starts stuffing them in his pants pocket. A quarter falls and rolls to the middle of the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John takes a thick felt marker and writes two numbers on wrist, right beside the watch. 15, and under it, 35. He then turns and stares at his wall, all the photos, sketches, notes, wondering if he's forgotten anything. He decides it is too late to worry. He loosens an edge of wallpaper and starts tearing it all down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke sits in the back seat with their carry-on bags. John tries to stuff all the garbage bags full of paper into th back. He picks the last off the floor and turns and walks out t the alley. He looks around, then stuffs this final bag in his neighbor's trash can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John tosses the last trash bags over the side of the dump that sits in front of a demolished house. As he closes th tailgate we get a good look at the broken taillight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He checks the clock on the dashboard and drives faster, t a quick glance at his son to see if he is okay back there

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John sits in his car in the back alley, watching the park lot. The driver comes out carrying trays of test results and puts them in the back of his van. John grabs the larg wire cutters and screwdriver from his car and hops out. H takes a few steps to the rear of the one-story building, pries open the phone box and snips the phone wires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A clerk on the phone is cut off. She jabs the connection key, does not get a dial tone -- looks to the lights on t other phone lines and sees them go out as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John snips the last wire and hops back into the car. moving before the van exits the parking lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The van driver hops out and heads into the nursing home a the Prius pulls into the foreground. John turns to Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy will just be a minute. John grabs his tennis ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John holds his lab results between his teeth as he flips through the envelopes. He finally finds Lara's envelope, removes her report and replaces it with this one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch through the windshield of the Prius as the lab v drives off in the direction of the prison. John tugs Carrie's birthday invitation from his pocket, f it open, checks the handwritten address.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harris enters Lt. Nabulsi's cubicle to find him standing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taillight matches any 2004-2009 Prius.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with a certain disgust) What kind of a criminal drives a Prius?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A socially responsible one? (avoids Nabulsi's searing look by reading the report) Over a thousand of them registered in the city, seven thousand in the state.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many registered to felons?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six in the state. Four of them to embezzlers or white collar criminals, one to a rapist, one to a murderer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess we start with the murderer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's in prison for life.      The rapist is out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John stands with Luke, who holds a hand-wrapped gift. knocks at the front door of a lovely small house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They see Nicole in the side yard, spreading a paper table

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They move to help keep the tablecloth from blowing away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.   Good to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hands her present)                                     It's a pony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those aren't easy to wrap. (now awkward) You know the party is at eleven, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What time is it? (checks watch) Nine. Oh, I'm so sorry, I should have looked more carefully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's no problem. (to Luke, re: present)                                  Why don't you go give this to Carrie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke spots Carrie on the back step and runs over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I guess you can help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Actually, I can't stay.   I have to run some errands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (recovering with grace)                                 We'll see you later then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks so much. (a moment) If....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John looks to Luke and realizes this might be the last ti he sees him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He...He has my parents' phone number in his pocket. In case I'm late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John throws one more look at Luke then walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The driver steps out of the prison and returns to the lab van carrying his tray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (enters with reports) Rapist is in a wheelchair.   Not sure if that was karma or --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The murderer. Where is she incarcerated?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (checks papers in his hand) County; right here in town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after mulling this over) She have a husband or kid old enough to drive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harris exits, knowing he should have checked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE MALE NURSE re-reads the test results.     Dr. Lifson approaches, having been summoned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (handing it to her) Lara Brennan's bloodwork.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (scans, now concerned) Get the lab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He dials.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone REPAIRMAN is reconnecting the wires, speaking t the technician who discovered the lines were dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You pissed off somebody, that's for sure.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Close on the wires -- he twists the second last pair, now connects the last as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MALE NURSE hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still busy.    I'll try again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (studying bloodwork) No. Get an ambulance, take her to University. I'll meet them there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara looks up as her door opens, and is surprised to see FEMALE JAIL GUARDS with a wheelchair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Prius pulls up and John waits and watches.   He check the clock: it clicks over to 10:00.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (enters with paper) Husband. School teacher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rising) You got a home address?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two female guards pass off LARA to two MALE JAIL GUAR who load Lara into an ambulance. JAIL GUARD #1 steps into the back of the ambulance with her. The ambulance pulls out, accompanied by a County Sheriff's car. John follows.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Handcuffed and shackled, Lara stares lifelessly at her GU as the EMT connects the leads of a heart monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Knowing where they are going now, John passes the ambulan and escort vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi peers in the window.    Harris comes up the side the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No car in the garage. You want to get a warrant?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Nabulsi reluctantly slips a credit card into the door jam Harris looks around to check no one is watching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front door pops open and Nabulsi and Harris step in. They quickly see that all the furniture is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi joins Harris, who is staring at the wall where th wallpaper has been removed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the warrant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sheriff's car and ambulance pull into the underground entrance. Guard #2 steps from the passenger seat of the ambulance and surveys the surroundings, shotgun in hand, before he knocks on the rear door of the ambulance. They follow procedure in taking the prisoner into the hospital The sheriff watches until they are safe inside, then leav

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi inspects Luke's room, still fully furnished, the curious faded crayon drawing on the wall. He spots a coup of coins on the floor. He picks up a quarter, and flips i Harris steps into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's being transferred to University Hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Have them call the escort vehicle. Tell them we'll meet them at the hospital in less than ten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he pockets the quarter and steps out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EMT and two JAIL GUARDS wheel Lara up to the desk and hand over her chart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have Lara Brennan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The duty nurse checks her chart and nods to a NURSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put her in 7725 and start an IV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EMT passes her over to the nurse and leaves. The DUTY NURSE picks up the phone as they move off down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into phone) Can you please page Dr. Becsey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The nurse wheels her in and GUARD #2 uncuffs her from the gurney, as GUARD #1 gets a call on his cell phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?... We're here: prisoner's secure, no problems.... Will do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hangs up and turns to see John enter, carrying Luke's backpack, wearing a white doctor's smock. He raises a gun

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put the phone down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guard #1 obeys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh please, no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remove your holsters, put them on the floor and get on your knees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (can't make sense of this) What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DO IT!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guard #2 reaches for his weapon; John pistol whips him to the floor. The nurse cups a hand over her mouth to stifle scream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DO IT NOW!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harris speeds toward the hospital.         Nabulsi is on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lieutenant, the prisoner is secure; jail personnel are 10-27, Code 4. A squad car will meet you at the entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi puts the walkie down and flips on the siren. reacts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She just said --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Run the light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A second handgun and holster      slides across the floor the one that already lies by      John's feet. The two gu kneel, facing the far wall.       John pulls a roll of du from the backpack and tosses      it to the terrified nur

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tape their hands and feet. (when he hesitates) Do it!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The nurse tapes the guards' wrists behind their backs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to stop this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You walk out that door with him and you will both be killed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tape their mouths!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John picks up the key and undoes Lara's cuffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.   Stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John yanks her clothing and a white smock out of the bag tosses them to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put it on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because we have no other choice!! Put it on! (to nurse) Turn around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He does, John starts taping his wrists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara, put the clothes on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOW!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stare at each other.         John offers her his cel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Tell your son you aren't coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waiting for you. Tell him you aren't coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can you do this to me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Push send. Tell him I'm not coming back either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does it look like I'm going home?! Tell him he is alone now and his mother and father aren't coming back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara stares at him with hatred, mutters:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You son of a bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara pulls off her prison garb, standing before them nake except for her panties. She quite purposely does not turn away or cover herself, but lets her eyes burn into him. John presses the STOPWATCH button on his watch and the CO starts running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A squad car pulls up outside the hospital's main entrance One officer strides into the Emergency Room while the oth takes a look around the parking lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara and John step out into the hall. John's eyes flick t the Nurse's Desk but he keeps walking. As they pass we no DR. LIFSON standing there with Lara's file in her hand. T Duty Nurse notices as well. It takes a second for Lifson understand what is going on. She steps out into the hall and stares after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John yanks Lara's arm and makes a dash for the elevator, pulling his gun from his pocket. The Duty Nurse sees what is happening and bolts down the hall, throwing open the door to room 7725.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator doors are closing as John arrives and jams h arm in between them. The passengers see the weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out!    Get out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They scurry out and the doors close. A heartbeat later th next elevator opens and the cop from downstairs steps off

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Luke?! Is he safe?   Where is he?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's safe!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The unmarked car brakes hard. Nabulsi and Harris stride o and into the ER, flipping their ID into their breast pock

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara and John barely breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The uniformed officer who stayed outside finds John's bla Prius with the broken taillight parked in a handicapped s He lifts his walkie and CALLS IT IN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi jabs the elevator button. He reacts as a HOSPITAL SECURITY GUARD comes running toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before he can answer, the elevator doors open and they co face to face with John and Lara. John sees their police I and levels his weapon. Around them, patients and employees scream and run away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be stupid. Drop the weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have units at every exit.     You'll be shot trying to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Lara) Hit the button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara stands frozen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hit it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She presses a button.     The doors start to close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doors closed.     Nabulsi runs and screams:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are the stairs?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOSPITAL SECURITY GUARD #2 leads the way. Nabulsi and Har pass him at the door as he yells into his walkie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Male and female; white lab coats! Parking levels!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (freaking out) Oh please oh please oh please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll be okay. (she keeps panicking) Look at me! Do what I say; it'll be okay; I promise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stares at him, having never seen him like this before

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take the coat off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi, Harris and the guard bound down the stairs into lower elevator lobby. Nabulsi sees the doors aren't openi and runs back to the stairs, meeting the cop from upstair on his way down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into walkie) Parking garage! Get your asses down here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi and Harris leave them and thunder down the stairs

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator doors open and John tosses the lab coats out toward a trash can in the direction of the garage. He pou the elevator button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi and Harris burst onto this floor -- see the eleva doors are closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch that door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harris obeys as Nabulsi flings himself down the next flig

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator isn't closing. John slams the button repeate He hears Nabulsi's heavy feet on the stairs, angles and a the weapon -- Lara can't believe what she's witnessing. Suddenly the doors close, just a heartbeat before Nabulsi gets there. Nabulsi spots the discarded lab coats and run out into THE GARAGE. He heads for the ramp, scanning the parked cars. Getting to the bottom of the ramp he looks up and sees a SQUAD CAR racing down toward him. As it brakes, Nabulsi realizes they couldn't have escaped this way; he's been h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouts into walkie) Who's in the lobby?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he only gets static.    He charges back toward the st

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doors open. John peers around the corner, hiding his weapon. No police in the lobby, but through the glass doo he sees a squad car screeching to a halt. He grabs Lara's hand and leads her out of the elevator and around the cor They weave down a corridor, deeper into the hospital, pas another cop at the Emergency Desk who has his back to the They turn the corner, see a hospital guard running toward them. John recognizes him as the guard he argued with whe Lara attempted suicide. John stiffens, but the guard runs past -- looking for a couple in lab coats. They quicken their steps. The guard stops at the end of the hall and turns to stare, recognizing them. He lifts his walkie and speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Main floor, rear corridor. John and Lara turn a corner. John spots the SHIPPING OFFI They enter and head for the loading bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi and Harris break into the lobby, sweating. Office run in the front doors toward him. Nabulsi surveys the sc realizes they couldn't have gone out the front. He hears shout:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back here! They turn and run in the direction of the voice, turning corner and seeing the SECURITY GUARD at the end of the ha who sees them coming turns and runs off after John and La

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio, on the run)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get units to Grant Street!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John punches open the door and they hop down off the dock and take off for the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John tugs Lara across the street, dodging traffic. He yan off his jacket and pulls it back on inside-out -- this si is black and gold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi runs out of the loading dock and into the middle Grant Street, HARRIS and the two OFFICERS trailing. Very few pedestrians right here. Nabulsi looks to his right: a crowded crosswalk, fans heading through a pedestrian mall a Penguins game. He looks to his left: more fans moving toward the stadium. Almost all of them are wearing team colors - a sea of black and gold. Nabulsi curses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara and John weave through the fans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put your hair down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara obeys without thinking. John checks his watch, then opens a door. Leaving the throng of fans, he guides Lara through and down the stairs into the T-Train Subway Stati

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi runs to the crosswalk as Harris takes the other direction. The other two officers take the far sidewalks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John and Lara quicken their pace.    The camera tilts up to the glass ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi searches the faces in the mall. He looks down thr the station skylight, catches a fleeting glimpse of them. runs for the entrance, his walkie flying to his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're on the platform! Block stations in either direction! Call the Port Authority. Stop all trains!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John sees a train approaching as they come down the stair Almost dragging Lara, John nudges past slower people to m it onto the train. Then they wait. The doors don't close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Walkie in hand, Harris jumps into their unmarked car and pulls out. Two SQUAD CARS wail out past him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Above -- Nabulsi sees the train and shoves past commuters

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John spots him coming, slips the long screwdriver from th small backpack he's carrying. Lara sees him tighten his fingers around the grip. The doors finally close just as:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi bounds down the stairs. The train leaves the stat Nabulsi leaps down onto the tracks and chases it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This station sits above ground. Three squad cars scream u The officers clamor out of the cars and run for the platf

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harris skids the unmarked vehicle around the corner, head parallel to the underground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi runs down the tracks, the car ahead nowhere in si

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The T-Train DRIVER gets an emergency call from the base. looks back into the car as IT RISES UP OUT OF THE UNDERGR Daylight floods the car as the train emerges from undergr John jams the long screwdriver into the door and PRIES IT OPEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wheels SCREECH and the brakes SEIZE. Passengers toppl to the floor. John grabs Lara and they leap out onto the tracks. He finds the slit he cut in the tall fence. They slip out through it, onto the street and into the parking lot beyo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harris screams along the road on the far side of the trac He locks up his BRAKES as he sees the stalled T-Train.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John yanks off his jacket as they jump into the rented SU John calms his racing heart, drives away and turns the co

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harris leaps from his vehicle and runs to the fence on hi side of the tracks -- it is ten feet tall with razor wire no way over it. He sees: Nabulsi charge up out of the tunnel. He jumps into the stalled train car, looks around, doesn't see John and Lar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SUV comes up out of the dark and drives away from the city center, as a police helicopter swoops overhead, goin the opposite direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John checks the counter, still running on his watch. 11:0 He wets his thumb and rubs his wrist until the 15 is eras All that remains now is the second number: 35. They merge into traffic heading toward the suburbs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi pushes through the hole in the wire. Harris runs across the tracks with his jacket off, having scaled the fence on the far side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into walkie) Ring the city. Train and bus stations. Get their descriptions to the State Police. (to Harris) How old is their kid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's find out where he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you tell me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You would've stopped me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods toward the glove box

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a case in there. Brush, moisturizer, makeup. Everything you had was old. I hope I got it right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She opens the glove box, unzips the case, and is touched this small gesture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detective Collero, who we last saw when they arrested Lar stops by Detective Quinn's cubicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to take a guess who just escaped from jail?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara sits in the SUV at the curb. John waits at the door. It is opened by BRENDA, Nicole's mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.   I'm here for my son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, they aren't back yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back from where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The zoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The zoo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finds an invite and hands it to him.       The back clear they are going to the zoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a zoo party. (in case he's worried:) They ate first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They should be back in about an hour. Would you like to wait?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.    Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John turns and walks back to the SUV.          Brenda wat moment, made curious by his behavior. He gets into the vehicle.         Lara is in a panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John punches ZOO into POINTS OF INTEREST on the GPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Luke?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's at the party.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sneaks a look at his stopwatch: 24 MINUTES and countin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What party?     You said the party was here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was wrong.     She took them to the zoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GPS comes up with an address.          John punches a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (can't help herself) She?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Estimated drive time: seventeen minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carrie's mom. Nicole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drops the transmission into gear and speeds off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A squad car is waiting, another arrives.          Harris and strides toward the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Canvas the neighbors. We're looking for the boy and anything they've noticed in the last few days.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John drives like a man possessed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John brakes as he spots a State Trooper vehicle at an intersection. As he keeps an eye on the rearview mirror, the squad car puts on its flashers, turns and follows the John's hands tighten on the wheel. He keeps the speedomet at 35, praying he's not their target. The police vehicle passes them and takes off fast down th four lane street. John breathes again and drives on. He checks the stopwatc 29 minutes flicks to 30. He pushes the button on the GPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time to destination: eleven minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara sees him sweat, unaware of the significance of the t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SUV swerves around a corner, heading into the outskir of town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John's eyes flick to his stopwatch: 32 minutes flicks to Signs appear quickly now.    Interstate: Keep Right; Zoo: Left. John keeps driving, hoping somehow that he won't have to make this choice -- their freedom, or their son. Too many questions rage across his face. Perhaps they can escape and his parents can somehow arrange to get Luke to them. Or perhaps Luke would be better off with his grandparents after all. Then there it is: The sign to the interstate points to the entrance ahead o the right.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The sign to the Zoo sits behind it, pointing to the next on the left. 34:02, 34:03, 34:04... John takes the freeway ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SUV climbs up the on-ramp, leaving the city behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You took the wrong turn!    It's back there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No response. Lara looks back over her shoulder, wondering if this is some kind of shortcut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The zoo is back there. You're going the wrong way! (no response)                                            It's back there! (no response) WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She'll call my parents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll take care of him, I will figure out how to get him to us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you out of your mind!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tried!! There's no more time!! Any second now there's going to be a roadblock ahead! It might be there now!! If we don't get out now we don't get out!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara sits back in her seat, stunned and horrified, as Joh continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I promise. I promise I will find a way to get Luke to us. I will find some way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara unsnaps her seat belt. She reaches for the door latc John sees her pull the door and GRABS her by the shirt as slams his foot on the brakes! The tires SCREAM, the SUV skids into an uncontrolled turn Horns blare. Cars behind them swerve to avoid collision. John holds Lara in her seat as the SUV flies around in a circle and finally comes to a dead stop on the shoulder, miraculously facing in the right direction. John allows himself to breathe. He lets go of Lara's shir She opens the door and steps out. John closes his eyes and tries to gather himself back together. He opens his door and steps out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John sees the big rig truck driver look back from where h pulled over. John nods to him that everything is okay and comes around the bumper to find Lara sitting on the grave shoulder, leaning against the back tire, staring out at t field beyond. He sits beside her in silence. Behind them the cars whip by.    No one even thinks to st see if they need help. Lara and John watch a cow in the farmer's field. There is nothing for either of them to say, they both kno how they got here. Their hands sit on the gravel between each other. Without looking at him, Lara tentatively entwines a single finger with his. He slowly gathers strength from her touch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They close the doors, and John starts the engine and they drive forward. John takes the first exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A garbage truck is just pulling up as Paula shows Harris an officer her recycling bin. They pull out John's overstuffed trash bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara sits in the SUV by herself, watching the entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicole, surrounded by a dozen six year-olds, passes Luke to John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it really is fine. I can't thank you enough for taking care of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is our pleasure.    Wasn't it, Carrie? John and Luke turn and walk toward the exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara turns and sees John and Luke walking toward her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you have a nice time at the party?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Lara walks him to the car, as if this day is no different than any other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was your favorite thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ice cream cake. She lifts him into his seat and buckles him in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They had ice cream cake here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At Carrie's house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.   What flavor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lots of flavors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My favorite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John starts the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to sit back here, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke plays with a toy. Lara closes the door behind her. She looks out the window and sees: NICOLE standing at the entrance, looking at her. Not exactly sure why she does it, LARA offers her a grate smile. NICOLE watches them pull away, confused about what she sh do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John drifts up to the stop sign at the intersection. A si points out the interstate to the left -- and he can see t overpass and freeway entrance; the business district to t right. He checks his watch: 48 minutes. He resets it to zero. Game over. He switches on the radio and searches for NEWS. Luke taps Lara on the shoulder.    She leans down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we're going to the cottage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods knowingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara almost loses it; smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.   Then I'll stick close to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John finds the news station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Traffic down to two lanes at the tollbooths. And downtown is worse. Stay away from the train station if you are trying to get anywhere. Not sure what is happening but a KPGH caller says trains aren't moving and commuters are getting irate. (etc.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John? (no reply) What are we going to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (finally) We're going to the train station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John turns right, heading downtown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detective Quinn spots Harris fly in carrying a brimming g trash bag. Quinn jumps up and follows him into the SITUAT ROOM. COLLERO hurries to catch up. Harris dumps the contents onto the conference table as sh enters. Quinn immediately dives into the contents. HARRIS and COLLERO share an awkward look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smitten) Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (casting her eyes down) Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She and Harris dig into the crumpled papers and photos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Collero) You're not going to nod off, are you?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Collero gives Quinn a burning look.    Nabulsi enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
