dialogues.text: John double-parks and pulls on a ball cap. Traffic is snarled, the place is awash with police and squad cars. Hundreds of people mill out front.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay in the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John puts on his sunglasses and walks right through the m of it all. Lara watches, certain he will be spotted and arrested. John steps onto the crowded sidewalk outside the front do He speaks to a large woman; she shakes her head. He goes to speak to a black couple, who apparently aren't interes He approaches an elderly couple.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SUV heads up the on-ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi is on the phone, catching hell from his Captain, has had an earful from his counterpart in the State Polic

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand....I understand. I didn't tell them to stop EVERY vehicle. Just the ones with a couple and a young child.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hangs up, takes the quarter from his pocket and spins on his desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John spies the tollbooth ahead, traffic down to two lanes The ELDERLY MAN beside him has a small bag on his lap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you sure twenty dollars is enough? Ticket to Buffalo costs three times that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now we notice the man's WIFE sitting in the back seat with Luke and Lara. John pays the toll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: SUV) This thing is very good on gas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A State Trooper waves them toward the booth. The trooper ahead checks them out and waves them on. are free. The same trooper stops the car behind them -- in it, a co with a child.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every one in the state.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go wider. Send their photos to every train, bus station and airport in a three hundred mile radius.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at her pad) So, Ohio, Maryland, West Virginia, New York, New Jersey, Virginia, Michigan, Kentucky and Indiana?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what direction they are going, smart ass?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain, a lot of these places barely have fax machines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then start dialing. (as they exit:) Prioritize. Closest airports first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi spins the quarter again, staring at it as if it w give him the answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Brennans drop off the elderly couple. John waves, dro his gun in the trash can, gets back in and drives away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harris and Collero finish recreating a portion of John's wall, complete with wallpaper.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Harris steps out into the HALL, passing an INTERVIEW ROOM Behind the glass he sees QUINN grilling MICK. Harris keep going into Nabulsi's office. Nabulsi sits, spinning the coin, jacket off, shirt untucked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to see it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only if it will tell me where they are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so lucky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi flattens the coin. Something makes him stare at h fingers. He moves his hand, revealing a Canadian quarter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How far is it to the Canadian border?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four, five hours?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rising) Collero!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SUV takes the freeway exit and climbs the ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi comes out of his office, passing a waiting ERIT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me?   You call this coffee?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi shakes that off and enters the SITUATION ROOM. Ev phone at the table is manned, all having the same convers

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm calling from the Pittsburgh Police Department. We have a fugitive warrant for Lara and John Brennan, they are most likely traveling with their six year-old son, and we have reason to believe they might be flying out of your airport.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Collero hangs up from her call and looks to the next numb

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many airports in Ontario and Quebec?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Should I stop calling and count?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi gives her a look.      Collero dials.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, we are sending you photographs. We would appreciate it if you could disseminate them....How many terminals?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (bursts in) I got his parents!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Brennans enter, pulling their carry-on bags.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (as she types) Long way to go with just carry-on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) You know how many times you've lost our bags?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hear you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John and Lara wait for Luke to step through the metal detector. The alarm sounds. John and Lara react as the security agent takes Luke into the glass isolation booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Collero questions Grace on the other side of the glass. appears devastated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, you just decided to go for a drive, for the entire day?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: George wanted to see the leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Track to the next room, where Nabulsi questions George.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you have absolutely no idea where they are going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you.    We never spoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: George stares Nabulsi down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A female security agent searches Luke, digs a handful of Canadian quarters out of his pocket. John's heart races.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Brennans approach passport control. Lara glances at John, sees he is sweating and red. She slips her hand int his and takes the passports.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns and smiles at the officer, putting on all her c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He remains stern-faced. Taking their passports, he examin them against PHOTOGRAPHS on his computer screen. He looks at them, looks at the passports again, then finally waves them through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they step away, the passport officer turns, sees his replacement waiting. He stands and exits to take his brea The SECOND PASSPORT CONTROL OFFICER takes his seat and mo for the next traveler to approach. As they do an ALERT co on his computer screen. He taps on it -- and up comes photographs of LARA and JOHN.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He notes them, taps the screen again and the two take the place beside the others on the watch list. He motions for the traveler to hand over her passport.

dialogues.speaker: THE BRENNANS
dialogues.text: walking away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phones are quiet. Alone, Harris stares at the portion of the wall that he assembled. Collero enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too bad you didn't find more of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. And wish I could figure out where this is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points to a small torn photo, taped back together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I checked websites for every tourist destination I could --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the presidential palace. (Harris turns & stares) It was all over CNN. When they deposed...what's-his-name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harris bursts in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We know where they're going!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John and Lara sit, waiting to board, Luke asleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll now begin boarding by rows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An AIRPORT SECURITY CHIEF snatches photos of Lara and Joh out of the printer and bolts out of the office, joined by two other OFFICERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John, Lara and Luke walk down the jetway, until they are stopped by the crowd of passengers before them. John trie not to show how nervous he really is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Airport Security runs up to the gate and pushes past the boarding passengers, searching their faces. The Airport Security Chief strides past the passengers and onto the jetway, the pages of photographs in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi waits in silence on the other end of a phone. room is full, no one speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A second AIRPORT SECURITY OFFICER squeezes along the wall passing the waiting passengers. We pan to see Luke's brig colored roller-board. Our hearts stop; it is all over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi waits on the other line for an eternity.    Final

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry. There is no one by their description on the flight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're on it. Do you have the photographs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The young AIR CANADA FLIGHT ATTENDANT kneels to help the child with the colorful rollerboard -- we see it's a FIVE YEAR-OLD GIRL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I take this for you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have the photographs. They aren't on this plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now see the GATE NUMBER and destination: PORT-AU-PRINCE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (listens, turns to attendant #2) Are there any other flights to Haiti tonight?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No other flights. Anything else?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ....No.   Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi hangs up, defeated.     Quinn stares out the wind deep in thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's starting to rain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nabulsi looks at him as if he's nuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll call the FBI.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Collero exits, Quinn turns and looks at the partial "wall

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ask yourself why we found this bag and not the others?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara looks up from her son, sees her husband staring out window at the darkness beyond. Ding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The captain has switched off the seat belt light. Flight time to Caracas, Venezuela this evening is five hours and fifteen minutes. While in your seat, the captain asks--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now it's just Harris and Nabulsi, staring at John's wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy was a teacher?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At a community college.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitting in his pajamas, George flips open an ancient atla and runs his finger down across the Gulf of Mexico to Car Venezuela. And he thinks of his grandson and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A taxi snakes along a mountain road, through the dense fo of Venezuela.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exhausted but awake, John stares out the window at the coastline below. Lara and Luke sleep beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More rain. Detective Quinn squats in the covered parking staring at the spot where the crime took place. Flash to:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elizabeth turns at her car, is slammed in the head with t extinguisher and she falls dead. The extinguisher is tossed to the floor and rolls. A YOUNG FEMALE JUNKIE yanks at Elizabeth's purse, getting blood on her hands before she frees it. She looks like a junkie. She runs off toward the sidewalk.

dialogues.speaker: 344A QUINN
dialogues.text: Turns and sees...

dialogues.speaker: 344B LARA
dialogues.text: She hurries along the sidewalk to get out of the rain. Turning the corner into the garage she COLLIDES with the JUNKIE. Lara's purse catches the woman's coat. The JUNKIE puts her hand on Lara's shoulder, leaving a SM OF ELIZABETH'S BLOOD on Lara's raincoat. She tugs free. A BUTTON from the woman's coat POPS OFF and hits the sidewa Lara turns and yells "Hey," then keeps going. She is about to get in the car when she sees the fire extinguisher in front of her left wheel. She picks it up, turns, annoyed. She places it down by the wall.

dialogues.speaker: 344B CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Lara gets in her car and drives off, oblivious to Elizabe body lying on the concrete floor on the passenger's side. Her co-worker sees her drive off as he steps into the gar He spots the body and turns and looks after Lara's car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn puts his used gum in a wrapper. COLLERO watches fro the car as her partner walks to the corner of the buildin QUINN steps up to where the two women collided and looks down at the sidewalk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was it raining when we searched the crime scene?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three years ago?? What are we doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn drops his gum wrapper onto the sidewalk. It hits a stream of water coming out from a rain gutter and washes away. Quinn watches it -- then follows... Collero shakes her head, grabs a newspaper to keep the rain off and foll The gum wrapper washes over the curb into the gutter and travels to the storm drain a half a block away. Quinn gets there, kneels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Act like a cop. Grab the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're out of your mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn jerks the grate up.    Collero grabs the other side helps him lift. They stare down into the hole. Quinn runs his hand along the lip, digging up the mud and sediment...finds nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really thought you were going to find it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Collero wipes her hands on a tissue as Quinn stares down hole a little longer, then lets the grate fall.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE LIP OF STORM DRAIN
dialogues.text: Just before the grate clangs we see JUNKIE'S JACKET BUTTO squeezed between the grate and the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The taxi crosses the ancient square of a small town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room has two single beds. John waits at the bathroom door. Lara steps out, a real awkwardness between them. She touches his hand. He offers a smile. She slips past him. He steps into the bathroom and closes the door. Lara lies down on the single bed furthest from the bathroom, f to face with her sleeping son. Without warning, he kisses her on the cheek, for the firs time, without being prodded. He turns around and lets her wrap her arms around him. And she almost dies of happines

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John washes, trying not to look in the mirror, not wantin to glimpse the man he has become.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara and Luke sleep, spooning. John sits on the other bed He picks up the TV remote and flips through Spanish langu stations. And there it is: CNN in English. Sports right now, but John knows there is no place they can hide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damon takes the money from John's wallet, leaves him with twenty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damon leaves him there. As John wonders if he is capable doing this, we cut to BLACK. Read:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hear: Knock knock.    Roll credits. </grunts>
